  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdListener
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.InstreamVideoLoadAdConfig
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated.
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.InstreamVideoLoadConfigBuilder
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.facebook.ads.AdChoicesView
    since 5.1
    com.facebook.ads.AdIconView
    since 5.1, use MediaView instead.
    com.facebook.ads.ExtraHints
    the extra hints API is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the SDK.
    com.facebook.ads.ExtraHints.Builder
    the extra hints API is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the SDK.
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated.
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description

    since 5.7
    com.facebook.ads.ExtraHints.Keyword
    keywords are no longer used by Audience Network

    com.facebook.ads.VideoAutoplayBehavior
    since 5.2

    Field and Description

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.InstreamVideoLoadConfigBuilder.build()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.buildLoadAdConfig()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated.
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.destroy()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling this method has no effect.
    com.facebook.ads.MediaViewVideoRenderer.destroy()
    com.facebook.ads.AdView.disableAutoRefresh()
    auto refresh is no longer supported and therefore this method is now deprecated.
    com.facebook.ads.RewardedVideoAd.enableRVChain(boolean)
    since 5.7, this parameter will be ignored
    com.facebook.ads.AudienceNetworkAds.getAdsProcessName(Context)
    since 5.7
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdBase.getAdStarRating()
    Star rating is deprecated.
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdBase.getAdViewAttributes()
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdViewAttributes.getAutoplay()
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdViewAttributes.getAutoplayOnMobile()

    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdView.Type.getHeight()
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.getPlacementId()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated.
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.getSaveInstanceState()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling getSaveInstanceState always returns null.
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdViewAttributes.getTitleTextColor()
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdViewAttributes.getTitleTextSize()
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdViewAttributes.getTypeface()
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdView.Type.getValue()
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdView.Type.getWidth()
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.isAdInvalidated()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling isAdInvalidated always returns true;
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.isAdLoaded()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling isAdLoaded always returns false.
    com.facebook.ads.AdSettings.isChildDirected()
    since 5.6, use isMixedAudience
    com.facebook.ads.AudienceNetworkAds.isInAdsProcess(Context)
    since 5.7
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdBase.isNativeConfigEnabled()
    com.facebook.ads.ExtraHints.Builder.keywords(List<ExtraHints.Keyword>)
    keywords are no longer used by Audience Network
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdBase.NativeAdLoadConfigBuilder.loadAd()
    since 5.6, use NativeAdBase.loadAd(NativeLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.loadAd()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling loadAd will always result in a delayed No Fill.
    com.facebook.ads.RewardedVideoAd.loadAd(boolean)
    since 5.6, use RewardedVideoAd.loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InterstitialAd.loadAd(EnumSet<CacheFlag>)
    since 5.6, use InterstitialAd.loadAd(InterstitialAd.InterstitialLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.loadAd(InstreamVideoAdView.InstreamVideoLoadAdConfig)
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling loadAd will always result in a delayed No Fill
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdBase.loadAd(NativeAdBase.MediaCacheFlag)
    since 5.6, use NativeAdBase.loadAd(NativeLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InterstitialAd.loadAdFromBid(EnumSet<CacheFlag>, String)
    since 5.6, use InterstitialAd.loadAd(InterstitialAd.InterstitialLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdBase.loadAdFromBid(String)
    since 5.6, use NativeAdBase.loadAd(NativeLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InterstitialAd.loadAdFromBid(String)
    since 5.6, use InterstitialAd.loadAd(InterstitialAd.InterstitialLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.loadAdFromBid(String)
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling loadAdFromBid has no effect.
    com.facebook.ads.AdView.loadAdFromBid(String)
    since 5.6, use AdView.loadAd(AdViewLoadConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.Ad.loadAdFromBid(String)
    since 5.6
    com.facebook.ads.RewardedVideoAd.loadAdFromBid(String)
    since 5.6, use RewardedVideoAd.loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.RewardedVideoAd.loadAdFromBid(String, boolean)
    since 5.6, use RewardedVideoAd.loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdBase.loadAdFromBid(String, NativeAdBase.MediaCacheFlag)
    since 5.6, use NativeAdBase.loadAd(NativeLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdView.render(Context, NativeAd, NativeAdView.Type)
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdView.render(Context, NativeAd, NativeAdView.Type, NativeAdViewAttributes)
    com.facebook.ads.AdView.setAdListener(AdListener)
    since 5.6, use AdView.loadAd(AdViewLoadConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.setAdListener(InstreamVideoAdListener)
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling this method has no effect.
    com.facebook.ads.InterstitialAd.setAdListener(InterstitialAdListener)
    since 5.6, use InterstitialAd.loadAd(InterstitialAd.InterstitialLoadAdConfig)

    since 5.6, use RewardedVideoAd.loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig)

    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdViewAttributes.setAutoplayOnMobile(boolean)
    com.facebook.ads.NativeAdBase.setExtraHints(ExtraHints)
    com.facebook.ads.InterstitialAd.setExtraHints(ExtraHints)
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.setExtraHints(ExtraHints)
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling this method has no effect.
    com.facebook.ads.AdView.setExtraHints(ExtraHints)
    com.facebook.ads.Ad.setExtraHints(ExtraHints)
    since 5.6, the extra hints API is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the SDK.
    com.facebook.ads.RewardedVideoAd.setExtraHints(ExtraHints)
    com.facebook.ads.AdSettings.setIsChildDirected(boolean)
    since 5.6, use setMixedAudience
    com.facebook.ads.AdSettings.setMultiprocessSupportMode(AdSettings.MultiprocessSupportMode)
    since 5.7
    com.facebook.ads.MediaViewVideoRenderer.setNativeAd(NativeAd)
    since 5.2
    com.facebook.ads.RewardedVideoAd.setRewardData(RewardData)
    since 5.6, use RewardedVideoAd.loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InterstitialAd.setRewardedAdListener(RewardedAdListener)
    since 5.6, use InterstitialAd.loadAd(InterstitialAd.InterstitialLoadAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.InstreamVideoAdView.show()
    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Calling show will result in a error callback and return false;
    com.facebook.ads.RewardedVideoAd.show(int)
    since 5.6, use RewardedVideoAd.show(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoShowAdConfig)
    com.facebook.ads.MediaViewVideoRenderer.unsetNativeAd()
    since 5.2

    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Any attempts to load an Instream ad will result in a delayed No Fill.

    since 5.10 Instream ads have been deprecated. Any attempts to load an Instream ad will result in a delayed No Fill.
